_source.short_desc: ActiveCollab is a software that gives you complete control over your work. Get a grip on your Real Work!
_source.long_desc: You can use tasks to organize your entire work in ActiveCollab. This way you'll focus on what's really important, set different priorities, generate a variety of reports, and enjoy a collaborative environment. You can also see all updates as they happen and enable steady progress on all your projects. Workload management, task dependencies & automatic rescheduling bring your project management skills to a whole new level.
_source.pricing_details:
Plus:
For smaller teams that need a platform for collaboration and managing projects.
Annual Billing: $9.5 for 3 members / per month
Monthly Billing: $11.00 for 3 members / per month

Pro:
For teams and companies that need to overview the entire workflow in one place. Billed per member.
Annual Billing: $8.00 per member / per month
Monthly Billing: $9.00 per member / per month

Pro+Get Paid:
For teams that need to track time, organize, and invoice their projects. Billed per member.
Annual Billing: $11.75 per member / per month
Monthly Billing: $14.00 per member / per month
_source.target_audience: Start your trial today, free for 14 days. Onboard your team, plan, collaborate, organize your work, and get paid.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly Project Management Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Over 1,000,000 teams use Trello worldwide as a task management tool to plan, organize, and accomplish goals from any device.
related_products.features: Tools rarely celebrate the journey that teams take to tackle tasks and hit their goals, but Trello does by bringing reward and ease into the task management process. Teams can celebrate their achievements with fun and flexible features that are intuitively simple and encourage a personal touch. Teams can store and track information transparently, run better meetings, and automate repetitive tasks with an intuitive interface that makes it easy for anyone to onboard, all from the same platform.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by millions, Basecamp puts everything you need to get work done in one place.
related_products.features: Group chat alone isn't enough. Basecamp combines *all* the tools teams need together in one place: message boards, schedules, to-do lists, group chat, documents & file storage, and more. Instead of stuff scattered all over, everything you're working on will be in one streamlined, organized place. Everyone will know what to do. Nothing will slip through the cracks. You'll always know exactly whats going on.

related_products.short_desc: Jira is a fully-featured task management tool for teams planning and building great products.
related_products.features: Jira is the task management tool for teams planning and building great products. Thousands of teams choose Jira to capture and organize issues, assign work, and follow team activity. At your desk or on the go with the new mobile interface, Jira helps your team get the job done.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a task management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: Our simple, no-code design makes it easy for anyone to create workflows in minutes, freeing up IT to spend time where it matters.
related_products.features: Empower your users and teams to automate repeatable work their own way. Our simple, no-code design makes it easy for anyone to create workflows in minutes, freeing up IT to spend time where it matters. A flexible interface and range of powerful capabilities help you automate both simple tasks and sophisticated processes. The result: better workflows such as streamlined content review, standardized employee onboarding, and accelerated contract approvals.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the world's leading task management tool with fully customizable and proprietary features that make it a must-have
related_products.features:
With features like tasks, subtasks, Reminders, task priorities, time tracking, custom views, Goals, dependencies, and custom statuses, ClickUp has everything you need to manage tasks for any project or team!

ClickUp is the perfect task management tool that brings all of your task needs into a single app and is used by 100,000+ teams in companies like Airbnb, Google, and Uber. Built for personal use and teams of all sizes and industries, ClickUp is a must-have tool for task management

related_products.short_desc: Plan, manage, and track your team's tasks on a platform adapted specifically to your unique needs.
related_products.features: Build your team's perfect task manager so you can easily plan, manage, and track your work all on one intuitive platform. First, integrate all of the tools you already use with native integrations or an API. Then add no-code automations so you can spend less time chasing status updates and more time supporting your team. So ultimately, you have the visibility you need to really take control of your workflows.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time Gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is an enterprise task management software with prebuilt templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is an award-winning task management software for enterprise teams. It includes advanced security and full scalability. Project managers, product managers, and program managers can especially benefit from its one-click Gantt charts, Kanban boards, easy-to-use reporting, and automated task assignment and file sharing. Explore tailored solutions for your team, including specific industry-led templates, workflows, and features. Do the best work of your life with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: Todoist is the world's #1 to-do list & task manager to organise your life and work.
related_products.features: Todoist is the world's #1 to-do list & task manager to organise your life and work. Regain clarity and calmness by getting tasks out of your head and into Todoist, no matter where you are or what device you use. It's a simple yet powerful to-do list app ranked best-in-class by Apple, Google, The Verge, Forbes, and more. Since 2007, over 25 million people have used Todoist to organize work and life, completing more than two billion tasks along the way.

related_products.short_desc: Hubstaff has trusted task management and employee monitoring for remote and field teams. Invoicing, reporting, payroll, more.
related_products.features: Fight inefficiency and work better with task management from Hubstaff. Track time through simple desktop, web, and mobile apps, then manage tasks, reporting, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Jira, Asana, Github, Slack, and Paypal. See work happen in real-time, track location with GPS and geofences, identify roadblocks and keep moving forward. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS & Android.

Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your team's productivity with easily customizable tasks for every shift. Start your free 14-day trial to try it out!
similar_products.features: Keep your entire team accountable for the shifts they're assigned with custom Task Lists. Easily provide work guidance for each of your employees by leveraging this tool's Task Assignment feature. Improve productivity over time with Task Tracking, which will help you keep tabs on your team by receiving real-time notifications whenever a task is complete. Join the 700,000+ restaurant pros using 7shifts to experience these benefits and more!

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time Gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Task managers use productboard to align everyone on the right features to build next.
similar_products.features: Productboard is the customer-driven product management system that empowers teams to get the right products to market, faster. It provides a complete solution for product teams to understand user needs, prioritize what to build next, align everyone on the roadmap, and engage with their customers. Productboard is easy to use, enables company-wide collaboration, and integrates into existing workflows. Over 6,000 organizations around the world use Productboard to build excellent products.

similar_products.short_desc: Process Bliss: Simple, powerful platform to manage repeatable team workflow and task management, with built-in process improvement.
similar_products.features:
One home for tasks, process, workflow & reporting.

Process Bliss eliminates the chaos of running a business - improving visibility, operations & compliance.

Manage team tasks directly from your centralise process, policies & procedures. Create & share reports or view operational dashboards. Manage policy acceptance, audit trails, archival and process feedback functions to support compliance.

Supports flowcharts, decisions, data capture, dependent due dates, recurring schedules and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Zipline is a single app that helps distributed teams align, engage, and execute at every level of your organization.
similar_products.features:
Zipline is a mobile-first communications and task management solution that helps organizations improve employee engagement and operational alignment resulting in better store execution and profitability. 

Zipline mirrors location and functional complexity, giving corporate and store leaders the ability to align daily activities to broader business objectives. Surfacing only the most relevant information to frontline teams keeps them connected and helps them to do their job.

similar_products.short_desc: Profit.co is the best platform to rollout Task Management for your entire organization. Align tasks with company goals.
similar_products.features: Profit.co is the best platform to rollout Task Management for your entire organization. Improve team productivity and collaboration  by bringing  your team?s objectives, plans, tasks, files, checklists and more together in one shared space. Ability to align tasks with the  company goals (OKRs) can improve execution across the board. Checklists make it easy for users to verify before marking tasks as "complete".  The innovative  "board velocity" idea aids measurement of productivity.

similar_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping teams get the right work done with greater visibility and improved productivity.
similar_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. Workfront provides visibility into all work in a single, scalable platform that consolidates tasks in a single, social media-inspired view. Organizations can use this platform to centralize incoming requests for prioritization, and teams can use simple inline editing capabilities to update tasks, due dates, assignees, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Requirements Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Requirements Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Requirements Management software helps companies align practical needs with IT functionality during the systems development or upgrade process. By managing system requirements, companies can shorten development time and optimize the quality of their systems. Requirements Management software usually covers hardware, software, functional, operational, interface, business and security requirements. Requirements Management software is related to Workflow Management software, Server Management software, Project Management software, Website Monitoring software, and Business Process Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.

_source.short_desc: ActiveCollab Workload is a visual resource management tool built for agencies and creative professionals.
_source.long_desc:
ActiveCollab Workload gives you a real-time overview of what people are working on and how the projects are rolling. You can see each team member's capacity and deliver a workload schedule that fits their strengths and availability.
This means realistic workload distribution and quick resource allocation every time. It gives you a clear perspective of all assignments on all projects so you'll be able to plan your work better and deliver your projects on time and within budget.
_source.pricing_details:
Plus:
For smaller teams that need a platform for collaboration and managing projects.
Annual Billing: $9.5 for 3 members / per month
Monthly Billing: $11.00 for 3 members / per month

Pro:
For teams and companies that need to overview the entire workflow in one place. Billed per member.
Annual Billing: $8.00 per member / per month

Pro+Get Paid:
For teams that need to track time, organize, and invoice their projects. Billed per member.
Annual Billing: $11.75 per member / per month

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a resource management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Manage your team's resources on a collaborative platform that helps you plan, schedule, and control your team's workload effectively.
related_products.features: Manage your team's resources on a collaborative platform that helps you plan, schedule, and regulate your team's work effectively. First, unify your team's workspace by connecting all of your tools to one platform using 40+ robust integrations, custom automations, and third-party apps. Then, leverage that increased visibility to monitor the progress of ongoing projects and make informed decisions about on your team's bandwidth.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is an enterprise resource management software with Gantt charts, dashboards, reporting, time tracking, and advanced security.
related_products.features: Wrike is an enterprise resource management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Improve your enterprise resource planning using resource management and allocation, performance reports, Gantt charts, time tracking, workload overviews, and company-wide visibility all in one place. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to accelerate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable is the database that anyone can use with a beautiful spreadsheet interface.
related_products.features: Airtable is the relational database for the rest of us. With a spreadsheet-like interface that anyone can use, realtime collaboration, and rich features like file attachments and reporting, Airtable is the friendliest modern database.

related_products.short_desc: Resource management for agencies, studios, & firms across industries to plan projects, schedule resources, and manage their team's time
related_products.features: Float is the resource management software that keeps teams of 5 to 5000+ in sync. Schedule tasks quickly with a real-time view of availability, including time off and public holidays. See your team's capacity and utilization at a glance to optimize assigned work. Connect with project management, calendar, and communication workflows via direct integrations. Keep project plans up to date with easy bulk edits. Scale up compliance with approval workflows and access permissions. Free 30-day trial.

related_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping ensure that the right people are doing the right work at the right time.
related_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. Workfront ensures that people are working on the highest-priority initiatives and that assignments are based on bandwidth and skillset-and optimized as need to balance loads. Managing resources in Workfront helps leaders meet shifting demand, maximize output, reduce burnout, and deliver impact for customers and the company.

related_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping ensure that the right people are doing the right work at the right time.
related_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. Workfront ensures that people are working on the highest-priority initiatives and that assignments are based on bandwidth and skillset-and optimized as need to balance loads. Managing resources in Workfront helps leaders meet shifting demand, maximize output, reduce burnout, and deliver impact for customers and the company.

similar_products.short_desc: Now you can see and manage every resource, across every project, at every stage of the project cycle, organization-wide, in one place.
similar_products.features: Discover the top resource management solution purpose-built for services organization with 50 to 5000+ employees. Kantata empowers businesses to gain immediate visibility into team utilization, improve productivity, and efficiently assign resources to particular projects. Know the impact of every project and resource on your bottom line and make more informed hiring decisions for greater business agility and operational execution.

similar_products.short_desc: Maximize your project portfolio performance with a centralized tool for resource management and capacity planning, Planisware Orchestra
similar_products.features:
Planisware Orchestra is a SaaS solution for project portfolio and resource management that brings you real-time visibility into team activities, resource availability, timesheets and project progress to maximize your project portfolio performance!

Make Planisware Orchestra your single tool for resource management and capacity planning to balance your workload and fit your allocations process, whether you need role-based or named resources, complex assignment rules with supply and demand.

similar_products.short_desc: Award-winning enterprise work management software for project portfolio management (PPM) and professional services delivery teams.
similar_products.features: Planview Clarizen is an award-winning enterprise work management solution for PMOs and professional services delivery teams. Robust project portfolio management (PPM) capabilities enable program managers and service team leaders to gain real-time visibility into work in progress, automate workflows, proactively manage risks, gain delivery confidence, and deliver greater business impact. Planview Clarizen is purpose-built for mid-sized and enterprise PMOs, EPMOs, PSOs, and ESOs.

similar_products.short_desc: Resource management for agencies, studios, & firms across industries to plan projects, schedule resources, and manage their team's time
similar_products.features: Float is the resource management software that keeps teams of 5 to 5000+ in sync. Schedule tasks quickly with a real-time view of availability, including time off and public holidays. See your team's capacity and utilization at a glance to optimize assigned work. Connect with project management, calendar, and communication workflows via direct integrations. Keep project plans up to date with easy bulk edits. Scale up compliance with approval workflows and access permissions. Free 30-day trial.

similar_products.short_desc: Runn is a real-time resource management platform with integrated time tracking and powerful forecasting capabilities.
similar_products.features:
Runn is a real-time resource management platform with integrated time tracking and forecasting.

Intuitively plan projects and schedule resources across the short and long term. Get a dynamic bird's-eye view of capacity, workload and availability as you plan. Track project budgets and view forecasts of key metrics. Use Runn's timesheets to monitor progress and compare plans with actuals.
 
Integrate with Harvest, WorkflowMax, and Clockify. Use the API to connect your favorite tools with Runn.

similar_products.short_desc: Maximize Profitability with Optimized Resource Utilization and Faster Resource Allocation
similar_products.features: Improve your project performance and revenue by quickly allocating resources to the right projects and ensuring effective utilization. On average, our customers see at least a 10% increase in resource utilization. Uncover hidden resource utilization opportunities with centralized resource management to improve your project profits. Optimize resource allocation with SmartMatch, the AI-powered resource recommendation engine that suggests the best resource based on multiple criteria.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your business profitability by reducing Project resource cost, optimizing utilization, and manage pipeline projects with SAVIOM
similar_products.features: Saviom Resource Management Software is designed to future-proof your business against market volatility. Its components include resource scheduling, forecasting & planning, real-time business intelligence/reporting, capacity planning, integration with other related applications, and more. It is highly configurable and can be customized for any specific industry without writing any additional code. Try it for free and realize your ROI, which some of the fortune 500 companies have already enjoyed.

similar_products.short_desc: High-level project and resource management software to help you make confident operational decisions across your people and projects.
similar_products.features: Resource Management by Smartsheet is a high-level project and resource management software helping teams make decisions about project planning, team capacity, budget forecasting, team utilization, and hiring needs in real time. Over 1,000 of the most innovative companies in the world rely on us from 10-person shops, to 100-person teams within global brands, to 1,000+ person professional services firms. We have been recognized for its design excellence with awards from FastCo, SXSW, IxDA + IDSA.

similar_products.short_desc: Built for professional services organizations to optimize operations and delivery, drive better utilization and higher profits.
similar_products.features: Projector PSA is a cloud-based Professional Services Automation tool specifically designed for managing delivery organizations. Modules for Project Accounting, Project Delivery and Resource Management enable better profit margins, utilization rates and operational efficiency. Projector BI provides PSO specific analytics and intelligence to measure and manage at every level and model your future success. Projector's out of the box functionality supports multi-currency, multi-company capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkOtter is "Your #1 Rated PPM for Usability in 2022" - Garnter.  Gantt, Kanban, Resource Mgt, JIRA Sync, MSP Sync, & Magic Dashboards
similar_products.features:
WorkOtter is "the #1 Rated Project & Resource Management Solution for Usability: ~ Gartner May 2022. 

Best for PMOs of 10 or more in Engineering/IT/Innovation ready to move from spreadsheets to easy SaaS project, resource, and portfolios maangement. 

Differentiator:  Unlike Monday, Smartsheet, and Planview you can plan resources at the project level (vs Task).

Top Features: Magic Dashboards, Portfolios (with What-If), Intake, Projects (Gantt/Kanban), Time, Capacity Planning, and Financials.

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite ensures the right staff are assigned properly through the project lifecycle for improved resource utilization.
similar_products.features: NetSuite's resource management solution helps optimize staffing and utilization by minimizing bench time and ensuring that qualified resources are working on the right projects. With a single, up-to-date, global pool of resource profiles, easily keep track of skills, interests, experience, work preferences, availability, and more. Managing resources effectively allows businesses to optimize profit margins, improve billable utilization, retain talent, and increase client satisfaction.

similar_products.short_desc: A modern resource management, planning & visual scheduling software with timesheets and powerful reports to plan your resources.
similar_products.features: A modern resource management, planning & visual scheduling software with timesheets and powerful reports to plan your resources. Stay in control and have an overview of your projects and resources in one place. Hub Planner's Scheduler, Timesheets and Extension features create a combination of tools that meet everyones planning requirements, no matter which industry you are. Customize your own Hub Planner and pay only for what you use. Try our 60-day free trial to see for yourself.

similar_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping ensure that the right people are doing the right work at the right time.
similar_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. Workfront ensures that people are working on the highest-priority initiatives and that assignments are based on bandwidth and skillset-and optimized as need to balance loads. Managing resources in Workfront helps leaders meet shifting demand, maximize output, reduce burnout, and deliver impact for customers and the company.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Demand Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Demand Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Demand Planning software helps organizations optimize production and sourcing of existing products and time new product releases by evaluating historical data and estimating future demand.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Enterprise Resource Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Enterprise Resource Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software integrates all of an organization's departments and functions into a single system. ERP software systems handle processes including manufacturing, logistics, distribution, inventory, shipping, invoicing and accounting. ERP applications can also control business-side functions including sales, billing, and human resources management. Enterprise Resource Planning software is related to Accounting software, Distribution software, Human Resources software, Inventory Management software, Logistics software and MRP software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Planning software helps businesses outline marketing strategy, budgets, and goals and measure progress against these parameters.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Professional Services Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Professional Services Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Professional Services Automation (PSA) software enables the tracking, planning, management and billing of services provided by independent contractors and services organizations. Professional Services Automation applications help to streamline individual projects, prevent loss of revenue and slow billing cycles and manage governance. PSA solutions give an overall view of finances, operations and client relationships, enabling a more efficient organization. Professional Services Automation software is related to Project Management software, Time and Expense software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Planning software allows businesses to create timelines for project completion, allocate resources, assign tasks, and budget for project-related expenses.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Portfolio Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Portfolio Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Portfolio Management software makes it easier for project mangers and organizations to analyze and manage numerous projects simultaneously. Project Portfolio Management software helps you allocate resources across projects, and collaborate between project teams. It is designed to help administrators collectively monitor project goals and view reports for multiple projects in one place. Other categories related to Project Portfolio Management software include Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Resource Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.
